Room.Name: Ashton Bridge
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking over the Ashton Bridge, crossing over the Ashton River.
Room.LongDescription: The Ashton River flows west across Riverdell Way. The bridge is not too high above the flowing river, which has been known to overflow onto the bridge in heavy rainy seasons. You can see the spectacular Ashton Waterfall to the west. The best place to view the waterfall is from within the Ashton Falls Resort.
